title: A first Game Book written in JSON
Wake up.
body: You wake up in your bed.

title: Jump out of the window.
body: Today seems very dull, you throw yourself from the window. After blacking out, you become aware that you're in bed.

title: Brush teeth.
body: You get up and go to the bathroom. Having brushed your teeth, you feel very sleepy.

title: Keep eyes closed.
body: This isn't your bed, is it? Something doesn't feel quite right.
